subject: Re: Changes to V3 of Product Brochure

full_threads.body:
Hi Stella, 

Confirming this round of updates have been made also. Apologies for the couple that were missed. 

We were able to fix up on of the images on page 26, but the other I would literally have to recreate the entire floor to remove the water I'm afraid.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath. Changes/things to fix are below (a few of these are mistakes/things that weren't fixed when requested initially):

1. Front cover - i like the photo, but the writing is hard to read. Can you reposition it maybe or flip the image? Just hard to read the left hand block of text
2. Edition 2 - this hasnt been changed. Meant to say Edition 3 - 2020, as per initial request
3. Page 3 - The WHERE WE SERVICE map looks like it's just been stuck in there. Could the 10 year warranty be moved to the bottom of page, map made bigger and moved to the top, and the WHERE WE COVER text in the same blue text as OUR SOLUTIONS is.
Might make it look more consistent and complete if you add this text below the header:
WHERE WE SERVICE
Our Durasafe 13mm compact laminate is stocked and machined in our factory in Sydney, custom made to your specific needs and is shipped Australia wide ready for installation. We foster and rely on repeat business and are proud of our growing customer base covering all areas in Victoria, New South Wales, Australian Capital Territory, Tasmania and Queensland. We're backed with a team of installers in Sydney Metro, Regional NSW, Canberra, Melbourne and Adelaide.
(if this is too much info above and looks out of proportion, cut out the second sentence please).
4. Anywhere it says 'Gravity Hinge 3 per door 3' - this isn't what we asked. Please take the last repeated '3' out. it should read 'Gravity Hinge 3 per door'
5. bottom right corner of page 10 there's a blank white diamond section - please remove.
6. Page 19 - HOW TO SPECIFY US, second dot point of BOARD SELECTION has a 'w' in front of it. remove please
7. Page 24 - the text 'We house...' block, can that be slightly bigger font size? Same again for page 25? Or maybe it's the bold on that block of text that's making it look odd... not sure what you can do to help it.
8. Page 25 - SUPPORTS should not be in capitals. Just a capital 'S'. Also some odd words have been given capitals unnecessarily. Please change to read and show as below:

'Can be added to all Duracube partition systems for added privacy.
Supports zero door gaps and keeps bullying at bay in
education environments.
Providing one of the most private solutions in the industry
when combined with Duracube's full height toilet & shower
partitions system.'

9. Pages 26 & 27 - can the opaque black box be more squat so it doesnt extend down so far? Covers too much of the image at the moment i think.
Also can the first image on page 26 be moved down a bit so we see more of the black partitions?
Finally on the 2 images on page 26, you can't somehow quickly & easily gloss over the wet patches on the floor in first pic and shiny wet floor in second pic can you? Somehow fade those a bit? Don't worry if it's fairly involved.

Thanks.

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Hi Stella, 

Ok sure, please see attached and let me know what you think? 

The selection of photos on the last few pages looks much better.

Thanks Heath, attached pics for you to use, but you do have 3 of these in the brag book publication as well - maybe use the versions you have used in the brag book as they're edited photos (you've fixed them up a bit for us). The orange Bennett's Oval pic you probably don't have on file yet.

Also one more change to make to the brochure please - could the cover photo please be changed to the attached that is labelled 'cover image'? Just want to make it easy to distinguish the difference between a new and an old brochure at a glance.
cover image.jpg

Thanks!

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Hi Stella, 

I have this ready for you, I just need the 4 images you reference in the last request please.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath,

Could the attached word doc of changes please be made to our attached current product brochure, and a draft copy please be sent back asap? Let me know if I've missed sending through any images or anything for you to use. Many thanks.

Regards,
Stella Simpson
Marketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228
